name: avanta-coinmaster
description: Sistema de contabilidad personal y empresarial para persona física con actividad empresarial en México

scripts.dev:full: npm run build && wrangler pages dev dist --d1 DB=avanta-coinmaster --r2 RECEIPTS=avanta-receipts --port 8788
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist --env preview
scripts.db:check: wrangler d1 execute avanta-coinmaster --command="SELECT COUNT(*) as table_count FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'"
scripts.db:list: wrangler d1 execute avanta-coinmaster --command="SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' ORDER BY name"
scripts.db:views: wrangler d1 execute avanta-coinmaster --command="SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='view' ORDER BY name"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:run && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:local: npm run dev:full & sleep 5 && npm run db:health
